meanings.definition: An additional performance at the end of a concert.
meanings.sent1: The audience clapped loudly for encores.
meanings.sent2: The band played three encores to please the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The encores were so good that the audience begged for more.
meanings.sent4: The encores were like sweet treats after a delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The encores left a lasting impression on everyone present.

meanings.definition: A request for an additional performance at the end of a concert.
meanings.sent1: The fans shouted for encores after the final song.
meanings.sent2: The encores requested by the audience were met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The encores were like a secret code for 'we love your music!'
meanings.sent4: The encores echoed through the concert hall like a chorus of joy.
meanings.sent5: The encores added an exciting twist to the end of the show.
